description: .22 Long Rifle ammunition with 40gr unjacketed bullets. This bullet has been imbued by a druid's will and pollen will explode on landing, which can blind and slow.
.22 Long Rifle ammunition with 40gr unjacketed bullets. This bullet has been magically shaped by an Earthshaper to turn into fragments upon impact.
.22 Long Rifle ammunition with 40gr unjacketed bullets. This bullet has been imbued with fire from a Kelvinist.
.22 Long Rifle ammunition with 40gr unjacketed bullets. This bullet has been imbued with ice from a Kelvinist and will try to freeze enemies in place.
.22 Long Rifle ammunition with 40gr unjacketed bullets. This bullet has been imbued with lightning from a Stormshaper and will bounce from enemy to enemy.
.22 Long Rifle ammunition with 40gr unjacketed bullets. This bullet has been tinkered with by a technomancer to corrupt robotics.
